sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>In Madrid, we are splitting the scheduleBenchmarkTasks scheduled job into two new scheduled job and deleting the old one since its added into the customers update set during opt in.</description> <name>Delete benchmark scheduled job on madrid</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sysauto_bm_script'); gr.get('sys_id', 'c755b62f5b0322003d1c484c11f91a2a'); gr.deleteRecord();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-08 00:15:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2ad9a7d3731023005e4a73a24ff6a7d6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete benchmark scheduled job on madrid</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Benchmark Client" source="sn_bm_client">3ad18693db92220004997878f0b8f516</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Benchmark Client">3ad18693db92220004997878f0b8f516</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_2ad9a7d3731023005e4a73a24ff6a7d6</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-10 20:09:41</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Delete benchmark scheduled job on madrid
